description.@en: When all else fails, you turn to the sword to appease Nemesis.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the sword shines like silver. The sword becomes a one-handed melee weapon with the Fast Quality. Instead of using your [CB], refer to your [WB] to determine Damage. Finally, whenever you strike or Parry with this sword, refer to your Incantation Skill instead of a Combat-based Skill. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, as if it were a melee weapon.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Dodge or Parry this attack.

criticalFailure.@en: The sword takes upon its own personality, dancing into the air as if guided by an apparition, for the spell’s Duration. For the Duration of the spell, roll [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die at the start of your Turn. If the result is face ‘1’, it will lash out at you; ‘2-5’, the sword does nothing; and if the result is face ‘6’, it will lash out at a random ally.

reagents.@en: Any sword, held in one hand
